text: aur jo log khuda aur usake rasoolon par eemaan lae yahee log apane paravaradigaar ke nazadeek siddeeqon aur shaheedon ke daraje mein honge unake lie unhee (siddeekon aur shaheedon) ka ajr aur unheen ka noor hoga aur jin logon ne kuphr kiya aur hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaaya vahee log jahannumee hain
